description: Generates a one-time challenge code to authenticate a user into your Amplify Admin UI.

nested_items.name: ChallengeCode
nested_items.description: One-time challenge code for authenticating into the Amplify Admin UI.

nested_items.name: SessionId
nested_items.description: A unique ID provided when creating a new challenge token.

nested_items.name: Ttl
nested_items.description: The expiry time for the one-time generated token code.
